arts.ttl: Man City sent Erling Haaland reality check ahead of Champions League campaign
arts.sum: TNT Sports pundit Owen Hargreaves believes his old side Manchester City are in the box-seat to win this season's Champions League following their 2023 1-0 triumph over Inter Milan in Istanbul

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou feels Tottenham can bridge gap to Man City and Arsenal quickly
arts.sum: Spurs finished 23 points behind Arsenal in the 2023-24 campaign.

arts.ttl: PL hits and misses: Hope for the rest - Man City are vulnerable!
arts.sum: This was only the second time under Guardiola that City had conceded five or more shots on target in a first half of a Premier League home game. The odds were stacked against them against a Liverpool side who had a perfect record from their first three Premier League games under Arne Slot.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola hails 'incredible' Erling Haaland after Man City striker scored a brace in comeback win over Brentford just days after the death of close friend
arts.sum: JOE BERNSTEIN: Pep Guardiola praised the togetherness of Manchester City's dressing-room for helping match-winner Erling Haaland play through the pain of bereavement.

arts.ttl: Man City's next five Premier League fixtures compared to title rivals Arsenal and Liverpool
arts.sum: Manchester City are the only team remaining with a 100 per cent record in the Premier League after victory over Brentford on Saturday

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland makes more Premier League history with Brentford brace
arts.sum: Haaland's strikes were his fourth and fifth against Brentford in his career, and astonishingly takes him to nine goals from the first four matches of 2024/25 – a feat no player has ever achieved in the 32-year history of the Premier League. Erling Haaland has made more Premier League history after becoming the first player to ever score nine goals in the first four matches of a season.

arts.ttl: Erling Haaland’s mental strength impresses Manchester City boss Pep Guardiola
arts.sum: The striker netted both goals in the come-from-behind win over Brentford.

arts.ttl: Man City 2-1 Brentford: Player ratings as brilliant Haaland inspires comeback win
arts.sum: John Stones sliced a clearance from a Keane Lewis-Potter header across the six-yard box, and Yoane Wissa popped up to nod the loose ball into the back of the net - the earliest home goal City have ever conceded in the Premier League . City were starting to find their groove again up against a deep Brentford block, with De Bruyne lashing a strike from 25 yards narrowly wide, and it wasn't long before they were ahead – a long ball from Ederson sailed over the Brentford backline and Haaland bumped off the challenge of Pinnock before dinking the ball past goalkeeper Mark Flekken.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola says Brentford did something nobody else has ever done to Man City - and he liked it
arts.sum: Manchester City struggled against Brentford but battled back through Erling Haaland to record another Premier League win.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola makes Erling Haaland reveal after taking personal pain out on Brentford
arts.sum: Erling Haaland's participation against Brentford on Saturday was in doubt after the death of a close friend, but the Norwegian hitman played and scored both goals in Manchester City's 2-1 win on Saturday
